variations.description: Summons a blizzard, dealing Magic DMG equal to 120% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Frostbite for 5s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Summons a blizzard, dealing Magic DMG equal to 140% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Frostbite for 5s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Summons a blizzard, dealing Magic DMG equal to 160% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Frostbite for 5s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Summons a blizzard, dealing Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Frostbite for 5s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Summons a blizzard, dealing Magic DMG equal to 200% of ATK to all enemies and applies a stack of Frostbite for 5s. Can stack up to 5 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies and freezes them for 1s. Each stack of Frostbite inflicts extra Magic DMG equal to 30% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 280% of ATK to all enemies and freezes them for 1s. Each stack of Frostbite inflicts extra Magic DMG equal to 35% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 320% of ATK to all enemies and freezes them for 1s. Each stack of Frostbite inflicts extra Magic DMG equal to 40% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 360% of ATK to all enemies and freezes them for 1s. Each stack of Frostbite inflicts extra Magic DMG equal to 45% of ATK.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 400% of ATK to all enemies and freezes them for 1s. Each stack of Frostbite inflicts extra Magic DMG equal to 50% of ATK.
Enemies who attack Pakane have a 10% chance of being frozen for 2s
Enemies who attack Pakane have a 20% chance of being frozen for 2s.
